# Oregano

## Common Names

Language|String
-|-
`en`|oregano
`sv`|oregano
`pt`|orégano


## Data

Key|Value
-|-
`botanial_name`|Origanum vulgare
`botanical_family`|Lamiaceae
`botanical_family_en`|Mint family

`ph_min`|5.5
`ph_max`|6.5
`ec_ms_min`|1.5
`ec_ms_max`|2.0

Measurement | Optimum Range | Source
